name: Into The Core (itch)
description:
Welcome on a journey Into The Core

This game was made by two bored guys with a little nostalgia.

The game was inspired a little by an old classic Icy Tower

   Your goal is to get down to the Earth's Core and jump-start it with explosives.

CONTROLS:

Move - A, D;

Jump - Spacebar;

Interaction - F;

Mouse for clicks;

The scoreboard works as the scoring system.

The SCOREBOARD doesn't work. Probably because I only tested it on the executable version of the .exe and not on WebGL. I'll learn for next time!

DEVELOPERS

Deiw - SoundFX, Music, Ideas, and Concept

eFko - Programming, Graphics , Level Desing

PROGRAMS

Unity, Aseprite, Audacity, FL Studio 20, 

This game was made for ScoreSpace Jam 22.
